title: Marconi Wireless Recipe
full_text:
Marconi Wireless Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
applejack
1
ounce
sweet vermouth
2
dashes
orange bitters
Directions
Pour ingredients into a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir briskly for 30 seconds, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry or a twist of lemon peel.
